entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 06:23 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
